title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 206.4 - Notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 206.4 - Notice of hearing

State Regulations

After receipt of a charge filed by the chief legal officer of
a government involved or the counsel, the board shall issue to the parties a
notice setting forth the time and place of the hearing, which time shall be not
less than eight working days after the receipt of the notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
206.4

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
